p: 291 ACE2 sequences, including the six ACE2 proteins with missing S-RBD binding residues in Supplementary Table S2, were subjected to multiple sequence alignment (MSA) analysis using Clustal Omega29 with default parameters. Pairwise sequence identities between the full-length sequence of hACE2 (accession ID: NP_001358344.1) and the other ACE2 sequences were calculated based on the MSAs. Besides the full-length sequence identities, the sequence identities for the 20 interface residues30 and five critical S-RBD binding residues31 were also calculated from the MSAs. The results for these three types of sequence identities are shown in Supplementary Table S4.
